name: Real-Time Cricket Score Tracker
desc: A Flask-based web app integrated with a live Cricbuzz API, containerized with Docker, deployed on Kubernetes, with CI using Jenkins and CD using ArgoCD.

name: Cloud-Native Monitoring App
desc: System metrics monitor built with Flask and psutil, containerized via Docker, pushed to AWS ECR, and deployed on Amazon EKS with Kubernetes.

name: Ansible Cluster on Kubernetes
desc: Custom Docker image-based Ansible cluster deployed on AWS EKS using Kubernetes Pods, including SSH setup and Ansible inventory testing.

name: Docker Management Dashboard
desc: Interactive Streamlit dashboard for managing Docker containers with basic functionality like start/stop, inspect, remove, and logs.

name: Menu-Based AWS Automation WebApp
desc: A Python CGI-based menu-driven app hosted on Apache using HTML/JS, integrated with Boto3 for managing AWS resources dynamically.

name: Automating Multi-Container Environments with Docker Compose
desc: Multi-container Flask app deployed using Docker Compose for simplified development and orchestration.
